description:
A former colonel in the Earth Federation Forces, who becomes the leader of the civilian resistance movement after the Crossbone Vanguard attack the Frontier Side. Cosmo decides to turn the training ship Space Ark into the resistance headquarters, and the arrogant attitude he displays towards soldiers and civilians alike soon earns him the enmity of Seabook and the Space Ark crew.
Source: Official Site
name: Cosmo Eigesse
